caption.title:
Oxidation Schemes of Adenosine Where the First Two Oxidations of Adenosine Involving Two Electrons Each Are Irreversible
46
caption.p: The product from the tertiary oxidation can be reduced back regaining two electrons. Adapted with permission from [ Anal. Chem. 2007, 79, 2, 744â€“750. Copyright [2007] [ACS publications].
